definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4
Zhong1 yang1 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Chen Tao graduated from the Central Conservatory of Music in 1986, from the Folk Music Department.
sentences.chinese: 陳濤1986年畢業於中央音樂學院民間音樂部。

sentences.english: She currently pursues her first year bachelor music degree in Haute Ecole de Musique de Genève.
sentences.chinese: 她現就讀於日內瓦國立高等音樂學院，攻讀學士學位。

sentences.english: The 20-year-old is a sophomore at the prestigious Royal College of Music in London.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他在久負盛名的倫敦皇家音樂學院就讀二年級。

sentences.english: Liu Jian, Composer, Professor from Wuhan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 劉健，作曲家，武漢音樂學院作曲系教授。

sentences.english: Rehearsals will be held at UC's College- Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 排練將在辛辛那提大學音樂學院裏舉行。

sentences.english: Fundamentally speaking, the analysis of musicology is a specific research method.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上說“音樂學分析”是一種特定的研究方法。

sentences.english: I like music, therefore I have chosen the university that majors in music.
sentences.chinese: 所以我選擇了中央音樂學院的藝術管理專業。

sentences.english: Miao Qing comes from Shijiazhuang, is currently studying dance at Tianjing College of Music.
sentences.chinese: 苗青，石家莊人氏，就讀於天津音樂學院舞蹈系。

sentences.english: The story happened in New York a famous musicology courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 故事發生在紐約一所著名的音樂學院裏。

sentences.english: Stemmatology also plays an important role in musicology.
sentences.chinese: 校定學在音樂學中也扮演着一個重要角色。

sentences.english: Born into a musical family, Micheline graduated from the Paris Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 她出身於音樂世家，獲得巴黎音樂學院授予的學位。

sentences.english: She is studying from professor Weimin Hu at the attached middle school of Sichuan conservatory of music.
sentences.chinese: 現就讀中國四川音樂學院附中，師從胡惟民老師。

sentences.english: Executive vice president of Shanghai Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 是上海音樂學院常務副院長徐孟東先生。

sentences.english: He Jie graduated from Sichuan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 何潔畢業於四川音樂學院。

sentences.english: Watch below the film of a high status performance by the Royal Conservatoire The Hague in the Dutch Culture Centre.
sentences.chinese: 以下是海牙皇家音樂學院精彩的音樂會表演視頻。

sentences.english: At the age of 11, she won first prize at the Paris Conservatoire.
sentences.chinese: 11歲時，她贏得巴黎音樂學院首獎。
